roleData.title: Software Engineer
roleData.description: Designed, developed, and optimized full-stack web applications and interactive user interfaces. Worked on a variety of freelance and personal projects, focusing on responsive design, performance optimization, and robust backend development.

roleData.title: Fellow
roleData.description: Participated in a comprehensive year-long training program focused on software engineering mastery, industry readiness, and personal development. Gained hands-on experience in full-stack web development, collaborating on real-world projects and preparing for a successful career in tech through mentorship and a strong support network.

roleData.title: Tech Interview Logistics Coordinator
roleData.description: Coordinated and optimized the end-to-end interview process for technical roles, ensuring seamless communication between recruiters and candidates. Managed logistics, identified process improvements, and maintained strong client relationships to support hiring objectives and operational metrics.
